name: Pew! Pew! L4Z0R!
description:
Very first playable game I made with ClickTeam Fusion 2.5 for a class project.

Basically a classic shoot'em up, contains a title screen, an option select screen with animated intro, a fully playable level with a boss and an high score and credits screen.

Some minor glitches (mostly graphic) persist but the game is fully playable.
